_header: Set fast Thy foot on Rood tree
_description: Turn to the Cross — one quatrain translating ‘In cruce fige pedem de Christo fac tibi sedem / Frondes carpe tibi fructus amoris ibi’ which precedes it in John Grimestone’s sermon notebook

NLS18721.Transcription:
Seth faste þi fot on rode treIn cristis bodi mak þi
                    seDrau adoun a bou to þeA froit of loue þer mauth
                    ise
NLS18721.Editions:
Wilson,  Edward. 
             A Descriptive Index of the English Lyrics in John of Grimestone’s
                Preaching Book.
Medium Ævum Monographs
         n.s. 2. Oxford, 1973: 33.
